channel.title: Final
channel.description:
Option Explicit
Private intNum(10) As Integer Private intSize As Integer Private dblNumAverage As Double
'calls arrays Private Sub Form_Load() Call fillArray Call processData Call printReport End Sub
'filles arrays Sub fillArray() Dim intFileNum As Integer
intFileNum = FreeFile intSize = 0
Open "j:\Student\vb\numbers.txt" For Input As #intFileNum
Do While Not EOF(intFileNum) Input #intFileNum, intNum(intSize) intSize = intSize + 1 Loop
Close #intFileNum End Sub
'processes arrays Sub processData() Dim intCounter As Integer Dim intNumTotal As Integer
intCounter = 0
Do Until intCounter = 10 intNumTotal = intNumTotal + intNum(intCounter) intCounter = intCounter + 1 Loop
dblNumAverage = intNumTotal / 10 Debug.Print dblNumAverage End Sub
'prints arrays Sub printReport() Dim intCounter As Integer
lstlist.AddItem "Average of numbers" lstlist.AddItem ""
For intCounter = 0 To intSize lstlist.AddItem intNum(intCounter) Next intCounter
lstlist.AddItem "" lstlist.AddItem "average = " & dblNumAverage End Sub

item.title: Final
item.dc:creator: @x_dis x dis
item.description:
@x_dis wrote:

Option Explicit

Private intNum(10) As Integer
Private intSize As Integer
Private dblNumAverage As Double

'calls arrays
Private Sub Form_Load()
Call fillArray
Call processData
Call printReport
End Sub

'filles arrays
Sub fillArray()
Dim intFileNum As Integer

intFileNum = FreeFile
intSize = 0

Open "j:\Student\vb\numbers.txt" For Input As #intFileNum

Do While Not EOF(intFileNum)
    Input #intFileNum, intNum(intSize)
    intSize = intSize + 1
Loop

Close #intFileNum

End Sub

'processes arrays
Sub processData()
Dim intCounter As Integer
Dim intNumTotal As Integer

intCounter = 0

Do Until intCounter = 10
    intNumTotal = intNumTotal + intNum(intCounter)
    intCounter = intCounter + 1
Loop

dblNumAverage = intNumTotal / 10
Debug.Print dblNumAverage

End Sub

'prints arrays
Sub printReport()
Dim intCounter As Integer

lstlist.AddItem "Average of numbers"
lstlist.AddItem ""

For intCounter = 0 To intSize
    lstlist.AddItem intNum(intCounter)
Next intCounter

lstlist.AddItem ""
lstlist.AddItem "average = " & dblNumAverage

End Sub
